alert.note: Alert for Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 09 at 5:57AM AKST until February 10 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The following area in the Southern Inner Channels, Ketchikan near Ward Lake. * WHEN...Until 900 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 549 AM AKST, At 959 PM AKST Tuesday February 8, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in areas near the Ward Lake recreational area. Minor flooding of trails is ongoing near Ward Lake itself. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen in the last 24 hours between Tuesday night and Wednesday night. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible through Wednesday evening. - Areas near the Ward Lake recreational area is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Please stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or your favorite local weather news source for updates on this situation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
